title: Sugar Cookies
tagline: Crisp edges, soft center, perfect for decorating
steps: Beat butter and sugar until fluffy, 3 minutes.
Whisk flour, baking powder, salt. Add gradually.
Divide dough, flatten, wrap, chill 2 hours.
Roll to ¼-inch thick. Cut shapes.
Place on parchment sheets. Chill 15 minutes.
Bake at 350°F for 8-10 minutes until edges just start to color.
notes: Don't overbake - they firm as they cool.
